DOC.brief_summary: This six ( 6 ) month , single center , randomize , double-blind , parallel , controlled-feeding weight-loss study compare two dietary group ( triglyceride olestra ) pre-diabetic obese woman .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal BMI 3045 kg/meter square waist circumference great 88 cm blood glucose level 5.86.9 mmol/l Prediabetic pregnant nursing food preference compatible study diet allergy food sensitivity study diet
